title: Manohari Polki and Gemstone Jhumkaalu
materials: Seed Pearls. Features a classic Hyderabadi polish for a lustrous finish.
features: These handcrafted jhumkas showcase a floral motif with uncut Polki diamonds at the top, adding a regal touch. Vivid ruby and emerald stones are meticulously arranged in a lower tier, accented by delicate seed pearls. The cascading design reflects a modern interpretation of traditional South Indian temple jewelry, capturing the essence of 'Nakshi' artistry with a contemporary flair.
colors: White (Seed Pearls). A vibrant and auspicious color palette often associated with traditional Telugu ceremonies.
occasions: and other festive occasions. Ideal for a 'Pattu saree' ensemble
adding a touch of 'aatmeeyatha' and traditional charm.
description: A harmonious blend of traditional South Indian design and modern aesthetics. The use of high-quality Polki diamonds and vibrant gemstones ensures a timeless appeal. The handcrafted nature and Hyderabadi polish exemplify the store's commitment to craftsmanship and quality. Symbolizes prosperity and good fortune, making it an ideal heirloom piece.
